        Constructor for character class
        Parameters:
        x - The initial central x-coordinate
        y - The initial central y-coordinate
        sprite - An Image for the character
        map - The map upon which it exists

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float x_dir,
          float y_dir,
          int delta)
        Move the character in any direction specified either by keyboard or predefined path. Check first that movement is not blocked by terrain Updates whether or not to use flipped sprite
        Parameters:
        x_dir - Number of units to move along the x axis
        y_dir - Number of units to move along the y axis
        delta - Number of milliseconds since last movement

      • setPath

        public void setPath(float x,
           float y)
        Set the path of the character to reach position x,y on the map
        Parameters:
        x - Float representing mouse x-position
        y - Float representing mouse y-position

      • render

        public void render(game.Camera camera)
        Render a character within the scope of the camera
        Parameters:
        camera - The viewport in which to draw
